My Experience

University of California,
Santa Cruz
Web Applications

At UCSC I assisted in unit test during application developments. I automated GUI testing via Selenium Python. I also assisted in maintaining over 200 sites through Cascade CMS. I customized CMS code blocks allowing for modulized JavaScript features including DOM manipulation. Another project I worked on I did code revisions on potential security vulnerabilities in ColdFusion including SQL injections and remote code executions.
